Context excerpt: competition obligations generally requiring that we participate in the e-vapor business only through JUUL. One of the provisions was the option to be released from our non-compete obligation under certain circumstances, including if the carrying value of our investment in JUUL was not more than 10 % of its initial carrying value of $ 12.8 billion.
